General.Name: Procorp S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Procorp, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, engages in the development of educational facilities in Mexico. The company's educational facilities include schools for the elementary, secondary, high school, and high academic level, as well as higher education levels in the cities of the Mexican Republic. It also participates in the capital of medium-sized companies that require long-term resources. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Boulevard Adolfo López Mateos # 2009, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 01010
